title: When will the ranked que be back up?
body: anybody know when the ranked que will be up

replies.body:
After the [maintenance](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) is completed, so likely at approximately 5:00AM PST if maintenance goes normally and nothing sets it back.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

so you took down ranked for roughly 13 hours and ruined an entire day of gaming for me as well as many others....why the heck wasn't this update done between the hours of the night in NA where most people are asleep?? Why take ranked down so far in advance...i just don't get it...I could understand it going down an hour before...2 before...but 12....what in the heck Rito =/ this was my off day and I was forced into arams and norms with trolls all afternoon.

disclaimer: not mad at you by any means but considering I just lost a full day of ranked play I am a lil upset by this situation.
